mapper.select: SELECT pt.id,pt.name,pt.icon_url,pt.description,pt.create_time,pt.update_time,pt.form_props,pt.status,pt.form_options,type.name AS processTypeName FROM oa_process_template pt LEFT JOIN oa_process_type type ON pt.process_type_id = type.id WHERE pt.is_deleted=0
